definition: secondary/auxiliary/deputy/assistant/vice-/abbr. for 副詞|副词 adverb/classifier for pairs, sets of things & facial expressions

sentences.english: And an adjutant galloped into the wood after Grekov.
sentences.chinese: 於是一位副官馳進樹林去找格列科夫。

sentences.english: I'm going out myself with the adjutant to recce training areas.
sentences.chinese: 我要親自和副官出去偵察一下訓練地區。

sentences.english: As adjutant I was responsible for his day-to-day programme.
sentences.chinese: 作爲副官，我有責任安排他的日常事務。

sentences.english: He prevailed on the lieutenant to send in a short note.
sentences.chinese: 他說動那個副官，遞上了一張簡短的便條進去。

sentences.english: Several of his aides, however, were pacing.
sentences.chinese: 而他的幾個副官缺在不安地踱步着。

sentences.english: The mission contact in the Raynor mission strand is actually a cybernetic adjutant.
sentences.chinese: 觸發吉姆雷諾任務的事實上是他的機器人副官。

sentences.english: In the middle of the day Murat sent his adjutant to Napoleon with a request for reinforcements.
sentences.chinese: 中午，繆拉派他的副官到拿破崙那兒請求援兵。

sentences.english: Liu aide in send a book on the way, in a favor by giving a person was suddenly took knocked out.
sentences.chinese: 劉副官在送書途中，在一較僻靜處突然被人打昏擄走。
他副官的意見非常寶貴。

sentences.english: Zhang Qishan command zhang adjutant laying such as explosives, blow up mine.
sentences.chinese: 張啓山命令張副官等鋪設炸藥，炸燬礦洞。

sentences.english: He was followed by an adjutant and the paymaster of the regiment.
sentences.chinese: 在地後面還走進了一個副官和團部的軍需官。

sentences.english: Their lieutenants in turn divide up the tasks into smaller chunks and command their reports to implement them.
sentences.chinese: 副官接下來會細分工作再命令下屬執行。

sentences.english: Foliaceous commander on the spot scamper is dead, adjutant Ling Hui is blood sufferred serious injury all over.
sentences.chinese: 葉司令當場炸死，副官凌輝渾身是血受了重傷。

sentences.english: Tian aide by Xu Dongmei charge came to the sea, and brought a letter.
sentences.chinese: 田副官按照許冬梅的囑咐來到了通海，並帶來了信件。

sentences.english: Aide-de-camp Bernard carried them the Emperor's orders.
sentences.chinese: 副官貝爾納傳達了命令。

sentences.english: He looked straight into his adjutant's face and did not recognise him.
sentences.chinese: 他直勾勾地望着他的副官的面孔，沒有認出他是誰。

definition: high ranking officer in Chinese army/colonel
middle ranking officer in Chinese army/lieutenant colonel/commander
junior ranking officer in Chinese army/major/lieutenant commander
senior official/senior officer/commanding officer/CL:位[wei4]/sir (term of address for senior officer)
